name: measure_distance
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool egypt_api.
Tool description: The Egypt Lookup API users to retrieve in realtime the latitude, longitude, and address of a location in Egypt. The API utilizes the OpenStreetMap and Project-OSRM to retrieve up-to-date location data.
API description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates, while allowing the user to specify the unit of measurement.

Below Example: **Distance between Alexandria and Cairo**

unit.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), **mi**, **ft**, and **yd**.
